title: Deere stock shots up after outlook lift
text:
Deere stock shots up after outlook lift 12:58am IST - 01:21
U.S. tractor and construction equipment maker Deere & Co revised up its full-year earnings estimate on stronger demand for its construction equipment, sending shares were up more than three percent in early trading. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. tractor and construction equipment maker Deere & Co revised up its full-year earnings estimate on stronger demand for its construction equipment, sending shares were up more than three percent in early trading.
